title: Find an Off-Market Deal
description: A well-funded investor wants to buy a specific type of property (e.g., a grocery-anchored retail center) in a market with low inventory. The agent must find an off-market opportunity.

tasks.description: Use property ownership databases and local knowledge to create a list of all properties that meet the investor's criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: A target list of properties is created.

tasks.description: Initiate a direct outreach campaign (letters, calls) to the owners of the target properties to see if they have any interest in selling.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent makes contact with property owners to gauge their interest.

tasks.description: When an owner expresses potential interest, begin preliminary negotiations and analysis to see if a deal is feasible.
tasks.expected_outcome: A potential off-market deal is identified and pursued.
